rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {TAD4503, TAD4523}

description: Designed as a flexible unit, with an innovative small-group mode of delivery that enables the unit content to be student-led. It is specifically designed to enable students to contextualise their own creative practice in theoretical terms. With an emphasis on creative and critically aware approaches to visual production, the unit aims to open up and consolidate research avenues that may be particularly productive for individual student's personal directions.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
